document_data.mainbody:
The Staff of Natures Wrath was an enchanted staff created by a group of militant Silvanites.
This enchanted druidic staff possessed a +1 enchantment and allowed the wilder to cast the flame strike spell as well as entangle with  radius. The wielder was only restricted by their visa. range to cast the staffs spells.
The Staff of Natures Wrath was crafted by a militant group of druids of Silvanus. The enchanted weapon was used to clobber the enemies of the forest, dispense natures punishment, and protect the dignity of druidic orders. The main targets of the Staff of Natures Wrath, however, were the clerics of Malar and his fellow Gods of Fury.
By 1281 DR, the Staff of Natures Wrath was in the hands of Arundel, the archdruid of Kuldahar on the Spine of the World. Later that year, Arundel was slain by Belhifet, and his enchanted staff was picked up by the heroes of Icewind Dale.
